name: Flor de las Antillas - Sun Grown - Robusto
brand: Flor de las Antillas, Sun Grown
additionalNotes:
The Flor de las Antillas cigar brand is another award-winning creation by the Garcia family made in their My Father cigar factory in Esteli, Nicaragua.The Flor de las Antillas cigar was created to honor Cuba, the largest island of the Antillas archipelago.
